title: When will colleges open in 2020, or will it open in 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: See there is no specific or exact guidelines that colleges may open in 2020 so it can take time that colleges will open in 2021, becuase no. of new cases per day of Covid-19 are increasing. But there are many news that says college will remain close till end of September. Here is the news of MHA guidelines Schools, colleges to remain shut till September 30: MHA new guideline - Times of India I think colleges may open in November or December because as on prediction the graph of new cases per day start decreasing. Till then just be in touch with new guidelines of government. Hope for the best. Thanks

I think for regular classes college will open in the month of December or in the January because all the colleges are looking for their final year or last semester examination . But for semester exams and entrance exams college will open in second or third week of September.
